title: Ground News - Terrorist who crossed border allowed to roam US for nearly a year, arrested only after ICE 'became aware'
text: Terrorist who crossed border allowed to roam US for nearly a year, arrested only after ICE 'became aware' Biden's acting ICE director admitted that an al-Shabab terrorist was allowed to roam freely in the U.S. for nearly a year after he crossed the southern border illegally.
